mapper.sql: picid, title, pcontent, subhead, picpath, p_sort, ptype, ispass, p_audit, isdelete, creattime, updatetime, filed1, filed2
mapper.select:
select * from dd_picture where
title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') and
ptype= #{ptype} and
1=1 order by creattime desc
limit #{num1},#{num2}

select count(0) from dd_picture where
title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') and
ptype= #{ptype} and
1=1
